text: OctaneLending | Senior Software Engineer - Python/Scala Fulltime or Remote NYC preferred full time 150k+ w/Equity https://angel.co/octane-lending/jobs Want to join an exciting venture-backed fin-tech startup disrupting an outdated multi-billion dollar industry?
